summary: Completed testing of job search functionality and resume download features. All 14 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend UI verified - Live Jobs page shows 20 React jobs, Live Jobs 1 (Premium) shows 10 Python jobs. Resume download (DOCX/PDF) and Word generation working correctly.

issues:

' in some listings - should be sanitized

passed_tests: API Health Check - returns healthy status (200)
Auth Login - successful authentication with test credentials
Live Jobs Search (React) - 20 jobs found from free APIs (Arbeitnow, Remotive, RemoteOK, Jobicy, HackerNews)
Live Jobs Search (Python) - 37 total jobs found
Live Jobs Search (Java) - 24 total jobs found
Live Jobs Search (JavaScript) - 23 total jobs found
Live Jobs 1 Search (React) - Premium APIs working (LinkedIn Jobs Search)
Live Jobs 1 Search (Python) - 10 jobs found from premium APIs
Live Jobs Recommendations - 25 jobs based on user profile
Resume Download DOCX - 37KB valid Word document generated
Resume Download PDF - 2KB valid PDF generated
Resume Generate Word - 37KB Word document generated
Resume Download Invalid Format - returns 400 error
critical_code_review_comments: Job search fix verified: Enhanced job scraper with synonym matching (TECH_SYNONYMS) working correctly
Free APIs (Arbeitnow, Remotive, RemoteOK, Jobicy, HackerNews) returning 20+ jobs for React/Python/Java
Premium APIs (JSearch, Active Jobs DB, LinkedIn Jobs Search) working via failover system
15-minute caching implemented to reduce API calls
Minor: Some job descriptions contain raw HTML tags that should be sanitized before display

success_rate.frontend: 100% - Live Jobs and Live Jobs 1 pages working correctly

seed_data_creation: None - used existing test user and resume
mocked_api_note: None - all real integrations. Free APIs (Arbeitnow, Remotive, RemoteOK, Jobicy, HackerNews) and Premium APIs (JSearch, Active Jobs DB, LinkedIn Jobs Search) all working.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Job search functionality fully tested and working. Free APIs return 20-37 jobs for React/Python/Java searches. Premium APIs return 10+ jobs via failover system. Resume download (DOCX/PDF) and Word generation working. All endpoints: /api/live-jobs/search, /api/live-jobs-1/search, /api/live-jobs/recommendations, /api/resumes/{id}/download/{format}, /api/resumes/{id}/generate-word verified.
